block.name: AutoBuild:MiniFortressBase
block.help: this is just a hack on the grow plant system, as I was unable to grant the blocks rotation, and if not careful it may cause random errors in other xml files not touched by this mod

property.name: Material
property.help: ANYTHING MUST BE SET HERE, even if later ends up ignored, OR WILL ERROR ON LOG AND MESS MANY THINGS!

property.name: Texture
property.help: txName_Reinforced_metal_plate_wall ISSUE: isnt applied on PlantGrowing.Next block, but is necessary to show something before placing the block
